reviews.sentence: Good stay. The room is very spacious with big bed and good deco. They give free cookies upon checking in. Room is equipped with Internet that can be used up to 3 devices. Everything is good except the shower head was broken I hope they will fix it. Another issue I want to point out is the parking. it is in Irvine where cars can be parked everywhere not like in downtown LA but doubletree charged me USD2 for it. I wish they could change to free parking.

Not Sure. Hotel is in good location breakfast is fine rooms are clean however there is no air in the room. Windows can not be opened so that it is very difficult to breath for alergethic people. Also there is no minibar in the room so no chance to drink cold water if you do not go to ice room while sleeping.

Comfortable centrally located but a few missing amenities. Overall a nice place helpful staff and good location. It would be a nicer easier stay if there were things like a mini fridge in the room a snack or drink dispenser on each level and of course if the parking was included in the room rate which is kind of crazy to me. I had stay again but as a better informed guest.

Will stay here often while in Irvine. Very pleasant stay. hall was was a little tight and uncomfortable when door to bathroom was opening and you wanted to get something out of the closet. That was the only issue every other aspect was perfect.

rooms smells. rooms smells and the service not good for the price you are paying also the rooms are very small and all is too compacted and is not fair to paid 19 dollars for parking wo nt recommend this hotel to any of my friends and family.

Almost perfect for business travel. I stayed here several nights during a business trip. It has great proximity to Irvine Spectrum Center which has almost everything you need and more. And it is within walking distance. What makes this property outstanding to me is its staff. The gentleman at check in and check out was professional and kind. I ordered room service very delicious and the servers were so friendly. They offer free shuttle to the airport. Shuttle driver was unbelievably courteous. And my housekeeper was top notch. I left a very large tip because it is so rare I receive such personal thorough housekeeping. I left a note requesting more creamer and every day extra creamer was left for me. The room was very clean both at check in and throughout the stay. Often times housekeeping can make or break a hotel stay. Room perks. AMAZING shower pressure spacious bathroom and tub good working hair dryer comfortable desk and chair to do work plenty of lighting. Nice coffee station large closet and plenty of hangers. As someone already mentioned no large seam under the door so it was possible to get the room very dark. Room service while a bit on the pricey side even for room service was delivered fast and hot and was really delicious. I did not want for anything. Except a swimsuit as I forgot mine. Cons it seemed strange to charge for parking and so much but maybe that is a thing in Cali. Also the breakfast buffet price was pretty steep but again Calis not exactly cheap either. I was a little disappointed that the buffet was not included with my room rate but that is something to be worked out between Doubletree and my company. All in all this is an excellent place to stay for business travelers. They really know what we want and need. And I am from Texas so I am accustomed to friendly people but I was bowled over how genuinely friendly and helpful the entire staff was. Not artificial at all. Only my second time to Cali but I left with a very very nice taste in my mouth.

Worst experience EVER. The front desk staff was rude from the initial experience. The maid left a dirty cleaning towel in the room. The pancakes were stale. It was by far the worst experience I have ever had staying anywhere. We would have moved hotels but we were threatened to lose all our points. I will never stay at this hotel again. I would rather travel on LA freeways a rush hour than stay here.
Nice hotel good location. Big room comfy beds nice bar and customer service. Breakfast is pricey. The room smelled like cigarette.
Room smells very bad telephone not working problem with shower.

My story with this hotel. Here is my story I booked my room through third party on September 3 2015 and I drove four hours from my home to this hotel I arrived at the hotel 401 am. I tried to checking in. but the manager told me that I can not checking you in due to the system is on processing to starting a new day. I was shocked. She received my booking a day a go and they have a data that showing them a person should be here any time why should I go and make the room ready to him. I have been traveling around the world and usually when I check in late they told me your room is ready and we will take a copy of your ID and credit and we will put them on the system when it work. What happened to me is she told me we can not check you in because of the system starting a new date and you will have to wait around 10 minutes to 30 as will as we will charge you the parking for a whole day. I was very disappointing that she did not even bother herself to make her customer satisfied. After 35 40 minutes waiting outside. she let me chick in I was so tired and trying to avoid Any arguments. I took my keys and she told me you can park your car and we will charge you Hourly instead of a whole Day. is she really the manager. I went to my room very tired and the big surprise was waiting me on the Bathroom. Please check the Pic attached because it explain its self. I went to her and show her the Picture. her response was Sorry that happened to you we did not put you in this room purposely. I was like seriously. She said without even feeling sorry to what happened how can I help you I told her I can not afford anymore this kind of treatment you did not even bother yourself I am leaving. She said OK fine we will go ahead and refund the money. I went to other hotel and booked a new room. it is 6 am right now and I could not sleep because of how she treated me badly. Khaled Alsulaili61 348 9021.

The front desk people were all super nice and helpful and the room was relatively nice as well. We had a drink at the bar and the bartender was very friendly and made a good Manhattan. The location was fine as well I was hoping we had be a little closer to the mall as we went to a wedding after party at the Yard House and were hoping to be able to walk home. The best part about staying at the Doubletree though is the cookies.

Couples getaway. My boyfriend and I travels from Illinois for his friends wedding that he was in the Marine Corps with. Rooms were clean along with the bathrooms. Very comfy beds. Would defiantly stay here again. We also got a veteran discount with our stay.

Front desk staff were helpful and courteous during check in room and common hotel spaces were all clean and you can tell the hotel is newer based on how little wear and tear is visible. Parking fee is steep 19 a night but I suppose to be expected for an LA suburb. Bed was extremely comfortable and the fitness facility was adequately equipped standard treadmills bikes dumb bells and cable machine. Would stay here again if I was in need of a hotel in this area in the future.

Good Job. the hotel employee whose name is Mark was very helpful and took care of our TV problem and helped us get settled in the room. The dinning room staff were attentive and always ready to help if we needed anything.

Great hotel. Very clean friendly staff quiet and the views were great. Great room amenities. Needed the shuttle a number of times and would just like to say that one of the drivers Eugene was so helpful friendly and accommodating. Food and service was excellent. A welcome gift of 2 bottles of water and warm cookie was very sweet. Overall a great experience.

Romantic Get Away. Booked a two night stay at the Irvine location. Front desk clerk Keny Lopez was very courtious and helpful. He offered to have our luggage taken to our room. Keny greeted us with a big smile and delicious cookies. The breakfast was delicious and resteraunt staff was very attentive. During our stay Keny and other staff made us feel special and welcomed. Gym room was very nice and clean. Updated equipment and steamed towels for after work out. Will definitely be staying at this hotel again. Our room was very clean and neatly decorated.

Great Service. Great staff and a wonderful experience. I loved the robes. Elizabeth at the reception was exceptionally professional and helpful. The room was very comfortable and the guest there all seemed happy and.

Omar was the first one to greet us at the front desk. He kept s smile on his face 24 7 and made sure the check in process was quick which is great since we had spent a long time traveling. He even offered us cookies and made sure to give us directions to our room. He has great energy and a positive attitude which really makes you feel special as a guest. The property is pretty and close to the freeway which makes it easy. We would recommend this property and stay here again.
The guest service was awsome we asked for more creamer they brought it up with in sec. They were polite. Rooms are nice big very clean. The shower was nice. also the room temps are perfect.

Couples get away. Great service nice room The pool and spa where a plus. The restaurant was A treat with good food nice service. The rooms were quiet and comfortable. The hotel is in a great location and fully met our purpose.
